titles.title: Expressing support for designation of October 2 as "National Manufacturing Day".
Expressing support for designation of October 2 as "National Manufacturing Day".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Commerce, Manufacturing, and Trade.

bill.summary:
Recognizes the critical role manufacturing plays in the U.S. economy creating good paying jobs that help support working families.
Supports the designation of National Manufacturing Day that honors the hardworking men and women of the U.S. manufacturing sector.
